      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Application entry point. The application should take 6 inputs: - the source directory recursively containing source XML files - the submission year of source records - the country code - the subcenter code - a boolean flag, the behavor is related to the type of the input - the source XML format (e.g. agrisap, simpledc...) - (optional) the path of a text file, for example to limit the ISSNs to be considered
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
